summary: A simple mod that adds some undigested eaten remains to animals or creatures as loot.
descriptionHtml:
Adds eaten remains like grass and other vegetation (if animal/creature is a herbivore) and meat like animal parts and human bones (if animal/creature is carnivore)
Some of the creatures' loot now no longer drop jewerly and gold.


Now has a chance to drop:

Chicken:
-Flowers
-Spiky Grass
-Chicken Egg
-Wheat
-Berries

Dog:
-Chicken meat
-Pheasant meat
-Skeever meat

Cow:
-Spiky Grass

Goat:
-Apples
-Flowers
-Spiky Grass
-Hanging Moss

Horse:
-Apples
-Flowers
-Spiky Grass
-Hanging Moss

Bear:
-Chicken meat
-Cow parts
-Dog meat
-Goat parts
-Horse parts
-Human flesh and bones
-Fox parts
-Rabbit meat
-Venison

Chaurus:
-Skeever meat
-Human flesh and bones
-Mushrooms

Wolf:
-Chicken meat
-Dog meat (Not because wolves eat dogs. It's its own meat)
-Goat parts
-Human Flesh
-Pheasant meat
-Rabbit meat
-Venison

Sabre Cat:
-Chicken meat
-Cow parts
-Dog meat
-Goat parts
-Human flesh and bones
-Pheasant meat
-Skeever meat
-Wolf parts
-Fox parts
-Rabbit meat
-Venison

Skeever:
-Some random food like potatoes, carrots, cabbages...
-Cheese Wedges
-Some sweets like Sweetrolls

Mudcrab:
-Clam meat
-Slaughterfish eggs
-Fishes like Salmon and River Betties...
-Nordic Barnacles

Slaughterfish:
-Clam meat
-Slaughterfish eggs
-Fishes like Salmon and River Betties...
-Nordic Barnacles 

Horker:
-Clam meat
-Nordic Barnacles

Ice Wraith:
-Leveled Frost Resist potions

Troll:
-Chicken meat
-Cow parts
-Dog meat
-Goat parts
-Horse parts
-Human flesh and bones
-Pheasant meat
-Skeever meat
-Wolf parts
-Fox parts
-Rabbit meat
-Venison

Dragon:
-Human flesh and bones

Spider:
-Spider eggs
-Human flesh

Hagraven:
-Taproots and saps
-Soul gems and fragments

Elk and deer:
-Berries
-Flowers
-Spiky Grass
-Wheat
-Some vegetation like cabbages, carrots, gourds and leeks



Feel free to suggest anymore creature loot and eaten remains I can add.
Also, please tell me if any of the loot don't make any sense and must be removed. I suck at Skyrim food chains.

You can teleport to a cell (coc 00loots) to check if the mod is working.
author: XxTWDxX
